title: Color & Texture Services
summary: Gray blending, creative color, and texture enhancements engineered for men's styles.
description: Blend seamlessly with custom gray coverage, go bold with editorial-inspired color, or refresh curls with a texture-perm service. Each session includes a strand check, tone refinement, and take-home care plan tailored to your goals.
processTitle: Your roadmap to a flawless color shift
processDescription: From strand testing to tone-lock finishing, we protect the health of your hair while achieving the shade and texture you envisioned.

processSteps.title: Consult & strand test
processSteps.description: We review inspo photos, lifestyle, and maintenance expectations before testing pigment on a hidden section.

processSteps.title: Custom blend application
processSteps.description: Layered lightening, toning, or texture solutions are applied in phases to balance lift, tone, and integrity.

processSteps.title: Tone lock & care plan
processSteps.description: Glossing, conditioning, and a take-home regimen ensure the color stays luminous between visits.
